Activity: Log in, check emails. Review the previous day's work on the quest system. Reflect on the overall system integration progress.
Start implementing the crafting system. Define a basic crafting recipe and integrate it with the economy system. Allow players to craft items using resources acquired through quests and combat.

Email @UIUX-1 @TART-1, Subject: Crafting UI/UX Discussion. Discuss the crafting UI/UX requirements with the UI/UX designer and technical artist. Determine the best way to present the crafting system to the player.
Collaborate with @UIUX-1 and @TART-1 to refine the crafting UI/UX design. Iterate on the design based on feedback and technical constraints.
Lunch break. Catch up on some reading.
Continue implementing the crafting system. Add more crafting recipes and integrate the system with the inventory management system.
Test the crafting system integration. Craft various items and verify that the inventory and economy systems are updated correctly.
Document the crafting system implementation and update the integration plan. Prepare for the next day's focus on character customization.
